attributes.action: Clarify all possibilities of risk and identify mitigating strategies to deal with significant problems arising from the switch on of the Large Hadron Collider at CERN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I understand that there are theoretical risks associated with this project that may create devastating effects. Whilst these risks have a low probability of occurring, the impact of them occurring could be globally significant. Government needs to understand this issue and have open debate about it.
